definitions.text: a person you know well and regard with affection and trust
examples: he was my best friend at the university

definitions.text: an associate who provides cooperation or assistance
examples: he's a good ally in fight

definitions.text: a person with whom you are acquainted
examples: I have trouble remembering the names of all my acquaintances
we are friends of the family

definitions.text: a person who backs a politician or a team etc.
examples: all their supporters came out for the game
they are friends of the library

definitions.text: a member of the Religious Society of Friends founded by George Fox (the Friends have never called themselves Quakers)
